signature.instructions: You are a product analyst tasked with identifying key features of laptops and netbooks that customers love or hate. Given a customer review, extract the specific aspects or features mentioned in the text, such as battery life, GUI, or applications. Produce a list of these aspects, which will help inform product development and improvement. Given the fields `text`, produce the fields `aspects`.
